examples: There are bound to be changes when the new system is introduced.
Es probable que haya cambios cuando se introduzca el nuevo sistema.
It's bound to be sunny again tomorrow.
Es probable que vuelva a hacer sol mañana.
You've done so much work—you're bound to pass the exam.
Has trabajado mucho, seguramente aprobarás el examen.
It was bound to happen sooner or later (= we should have expected it).
Estaba destinado a suceder tarde o temprano (= deberíamos haberlo esperado).
